name: Puzzle Clubhouse: Crowd Designed Episodic Game Dev
blurb: Ready to be a Game Designer? At Puzzle Clubhouse, people who PLAY games help MAKE games! Design, Submit, Vote and Play!

rewards.reward: \u2582\u2583\u2585\u2587 FOUNDERS KEEPERS \u2587\u2585\u2583\u2582\r\nPermanent \u201cFOUNDER\u201d status on your Puzzle Clubhouse profile + three cool limited edition desktop backgrounds: one featuring the Puzzle Clubhouse characters, one by Kyle Gabler, and one from the Extra Credits team. You'll also get our hearty thanks and a salute to you for your support.

___\u2582\u2583\u2585\u2587 PUZZLE PAL \u2587\u2585\u2583\u2582___             \r\nYou get the above + a one year membership in Puzzle Clubhouse (est. value $20) + a set of limited edition Puzzle Clubhouse Postcards mailed to you + a free download of Triazzle Island by Schell Games for PC or Mac.

_\u2582\u2583\u2585\u2587 SUPER PUZZLE PAL \u2587\u2585\u2583\u2582_ \r\nYou get the above + Lifetime Membership in Puzzle Clubhouse (est. value $50) for you + a one year gift membership for a friend + the full unlocked version of InnerCube by Schell Games (for PC or Mac) + a Puzzle Clubhouse T-Shirt mailed to you. And we'll make a YouTube video with Puzzle Clubhouse characters talking about how cool you are!

\u2583\u2585\u2587 FOUNDING OVERLORD \u2587\u2585\u2583\r\nYou get the above + permanent \u201cOVERLORD\u201d status on your Puzzle Clubhouse profile + a lifetime gift membership for a friend + we mail you a Deck of Lenses signed by Jesse Schell and inscribed to you.

\u2592\u2588\u2588 JIM RUGG FANBOY SPECIAL \u2588\u2588\u2592\r\nEverything in the FOUNDING OVERLORD package + a signed book or print (first come, first served!) from Jim Rugg, FoPC (Friend of Puzzle Clubhouse) and comic artist extraordinaire!

\u2592\u2588\u2588 KYLE GABLER SPECIAL \u2588\u2588\u2592 Everything in the FOUNDING OVERLORD package + a signed print from Kyle Gabler (Friend of Puzzle Clubhouse) game designer (World of Goo) and artist par excellence!
\u2592\u2588\u2588 EXTRA CREDITS SPECIAL \u2588\u2588\u2592 \r\nEverything in the FOUNDING OVERLORD package + a signed print from the Extra Credits team (FoPC)!
\u2592\u2588\u2588 STAR WARS SPECIAL \u2588\u2588\u2592 \r\nEverything in the FOUNDING OVERLORD package + a special C-3PO minature, signed by Anthony Daniels! (Friend of Puzzle Clubhouse)

\u2580\u2588\u2588 GAME DESIGNER  PACKAGE \u2588\u2588\u2580\r\nOK- this is where it starts to get crazy! --- You get everything in the FOUNDING OVERLORD package + four more lifetime gift memberships for your friends + You become part of the game design team for the first six episodes! We\u2019ll include you on phone conferences and emails, so you\u2019ll get a backstage look at the magic of game development, and you can weigh in with your genius ideas + we mail you a copy of The Art of Game Design signed by Jesse Schell and dedicated to you!

\u2580\u2588 SUPER SPONSOR PACKAGE \u2588\u2580 Everything from the GAME DESIGNER PACKAGE + Sponsorship of one of the first six episodes, in which all players will see a \u201cBrought to you by <your awesome name>\u201d. You\u2019ll be, like, famous!

\u2580\u2588 LUDOLOGIST\u2019S DELIGHT \u2588\u2580\r\nEverything from the GAME DESIGNER PACKAGE + The complete collection of 17 game design related books from ETC Press (several signed by authors!) + a signed and inscribed copy of Gender Inclusive Game Design by Sheri Graner Ray + a signed and inscribed copy of Interactive Storytelling for Videogames by Chris Klug + a signed copy of A Theory of Fun by Raph Koster + a signed copy of Reality Is Broken by Jane McGonigal. (For more about these authors, check out the reward section to the left.)

\u2580\u2588 GET YOURSELF IN THE GAME \u2588\u2580\r\nReady for a makeover? You get everything from the LUDOLOGIST\u2019S DELIGHT + We create a new character for Puzzle Clubhouse based on *you*! It\u2019s the person you would be... if you were a famous cartoon character!

\u2666\u2660\u2665\u2663// EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR \\\\\u2663\u2665\u2660\u2666\r\nBelieve it! You get everything in the SUPER SPONSOR PACKAGE + You get to direct an entire episode of Puzzle Clubhouse! Pick the theme! The story! Help write the script! Guide the artists and animators! Force the game designers to carry out your bizarre wishes! Get the community to contribute whatever it is you think would be coolest! Put your pets in it! Schell Games is your genie -- make a wish**! We\u2019ll fly* you (and a friend) to Schell Games for a kick off meeting and grand tour of Schell Games. We\u2019ll also take you to lunch and dinner, you\u2019ll get personal juggling lessons from Jesse Schell, and afterwards, you\u2019ll stay in close touch with the team to make the episode come out just how you want! (*U.S. domestic flights, **subject to reality, decency, legality, and common sense.)
\u2666\u2660\u2665\u2663// PCH BOOKMARK EXTREME \\\\\u2663\u2665\u2660\u2666\r\nEverything in the EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR PACKAGE + a Puzzle Clubhouse bookmark!
